price: 4. qui accomplissent la Çalât, s’acquittent de la Zakât et qui croient avec certitude à la vie future.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
